mapper.select:
SELECT t.* FROM hcf_vending_order t
AND t.vendCode like CONCAT('%','${vendCode}','%' )
AND t.orderNo like CONCAT('%','${orderNo}','%' )
AND t.orderStatus like CONCAT('%','${orderStatus}','%' )
AND t.paymentStatus like CONCAT('%','${paymentStatus}','%' )
AND t.shipmentStatus like CONCAT('%','${shipmentStatus}','%' )
AND t.createDate >= #{startTime}
AND t.createDate <= #{endTime}
AND t.channel like CONCAT('%','${channel}','%' )
ORDER BY t.paymentDate desc
